page.title: 04CHILDREN'S GAMES
page.content: During playtimes at school we play many different games. The younger children play imaginative games, when they pretend to be characters like{Superman}or{Aliens,}or they play{House. We play more organised games with rules. Some of the games we like to play are{French Cricket,Football, {Kick-the-can, Skipping with elastic, {Red Amber Green Go, British Bulldogs, {Trenches}and{Tig}or{Double Tig. Many games involve catching others or playing with a ball. Singing games enjoyed by girls are:- {The Farmer's in his Den, Mary Died, A {Prince Came Riding, The Yodler, The {Big Ship Sails on the Alley Alley O, {Oranges and Lemons}and{I sent a Letter {to my Love. Sometimes we practise{Football, Rugby, {Cricket, Netball}or{Rounders.
